page.title: 08KING'S NEWNHAM I
page.content:
Amenities & Attractions
The two villages of King's Newnham and Church Lawford are in close proximity to each other and have therefore been counted together in our survey. There is not a row of shops as such, although a village shop is available for the essentials. Some way from this is a nursery set in the pleasant surrounding countryside. The extensive complex houses a wide variety of house and garden plants. Standing on the outskirts of King's Newnham is an old church tower of historical value which dates back to Medieval times.
